resources.string:
Kaboot is a robust Linux emulation application developed by Kaboom, enabling a full Linux environment on Android devices—no root access required. It supports the latest Android versions and is specifically engineered to bypass W^X (Write XOR Execute) restrictions, ensuring maximum compatibility and stability.

Credits
We extend our sincere appreciation to the projects and libraries that have contributed to the development of Kaboot:

• Termux – for the TerminalView integration; updated and modified to work in Kaboot
• Proot – extensively updated and modified for enhanced flexibility, compatibility, and to operate under W^X restrictions. The updated version is included as libKaboot
• libTalloc – a key dependency used within libKaboot
